extension.name: RSMonials Scroller Module
extension.author: RS Web Solutions
extension.copyright: Copyright (c) 2013-2022 RS Web Solutions - Development Team
extension.description: RS-MonialScroller is a Module developed for Joomla! and for RS-Monilals Component. If you do not have the Component please go to http://www.rswebsols.com and download it. This will only work if you are using our Rs-Monials Component. Using this module you can able to display all of your testimonials in a module position with auto scroller.

field.name: rsm_scroller_width
field.label: Module Width
field.description: Width of the Module

field.name: rsm_scroller_height
field.label: Module Height
field.description: Height of the Module

field.name: rsm_scroller_border_thickness
field.label: Border Thickness
field.description: Module Border Thickness

field.name: rsm_scroller_border_style
field.label: Border Style
field.description: Module Border Style

field.name: rsm_scroller_border_color
field.label: Border Color
field.description: Module Border Color, including # (Example: #CCCCCC)

field.name: rsm_align
field.label: Text Alignment
field.description: Select the alignment of the testimonial text, by default it is 'left' aligned

field.name: rsm_scroller_padding
field.label: Padding
field.description: Module Padding from Border

field.name: rsm_scroller_delay
field.label: Scrolling Delay
field.description: Scrolling Delay Time in Seconds

field.name: rsm_scroller_ordering
field.label: Testimonial Ordering
field.description: Ordering of the testimonials

field.name: rsm_scroller_load
field.label: No. of Testimonials
field.description: How many testimonial you wish to load in this module?

field.name: rsm_scroller_additional
field.label: Additional Style
field.description: You can add additional CSS style for this module here

field.name: rsm_scroller_char
field.label: Character Limit
field.description: Specify the maximum number of characters to dispaly. By Default it is 300. Insert 0 to display all characters.

field.name: rsm_imagedisplay
field.label: Display Image
field.description: Select Yes to display 'Image of Submitter'.

field.name: rsm_image_maxw
field.label: Maximum Image Width
field.description: Specify the maximum width of the image. By Default it is 100.

field.name: rsm_image_maxh
field.label: Maximum Image Height
field.description: Specify the maximum height of the image. By Default it is 100.

field.name: rsm_imagealignment
field.label: Image alignment
field.description: Alignment of the image.

field.name: rsm_imagedefault
field.label: Default Image
field.description: Default image in no user iamge found.

field.name: rsm_image_border
field.label: Image Border Style
field.description: Image border style. By Default it is 1px solid #DEDEDE.

field.name: rsm_aboutdisplay
field.label: Display Addition Info
field.description: Select 'YES' to display additional information. Select 'NO' to hide.

field.name: rsm_urldisplay
field.label: Display Website
field.description: Select 'YES' to display website. Select 'NO' to hide website.

field.name: rsm_datedisplay
field.label: Display Date
field.description: Select 'YES' to display Date. Select 'NO' to hide date.

field.name: rsm_scroller_moredisplay
field.label: Display 'View More'
field.description: Select Yes to display 'View More' Link at the end. If you choose 'Yes' please do not forget to specify the following parameter related to 'View More'.

field.name: rsm_scroller_moretext
field.label: 'View More' Text
field.description: Enter the 'View More' text of your choice, example: 'More >>', 'View All' etc. etc.

field.name: rsm_scroller_morealign
field.label: 'View More' Text Alignment
field.description: Select the alignment of the 'View More' text, by default it is 'right'

field.name: rsm_scroller_moreurl
field.label: 'View More' URL
field.description: When anyone will click 'View More >>' Link the page will redirect the user to this URL.
